patthana15.84:1.1_0: Saraṇaṁ micchattaniyataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaraṇo namicchattaniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana15.84:2.1_0: Araṇaṁ sammattaniyataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaraṇo nasammattaniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana15.84:3.1_0: Araṇaṁ aniyataṁ dhammaṁ paccayā naaraṇo naaniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana15.84:3.1_1: Araṇaṁ aniyataṁ dhammaṁ paccayā nasaraṇo naaniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
